section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:FileSortingWiz.AvailableKeyWordsFileSortingWiz.FileRulesFileSortingWiz.MetaInfoFieldFileSortingWiz.Rule
Represents a set of rules and configurations for managing file paths, metadata, and file-specific rules FileSortingWiz.RuleFile
Represents a file containing rules for organizing and managing files FileSortingWiz.Wizard
Represents a wizard that processes rule files and manages file data collection
